text: we met for the first time as far as I
remember when we were on our way to this
orientation at Darian high school I had
a broken leg over the summer so I was
recovering and I was just getting off
the crutches so I being really not only
curious but talkative person decided to
ask him about it and he kind of ignored
me the first time I actually remember
meeting her was at a happy hour in
Stamford Connecticut and I remember
sitting near her and I remember her
talking a lot I was this really chatty
talkative person and every time I'd ask
him a question I would get very simple
answer have you been living here a long
time and he would say yes and that would
be it she was very talkative the way it
shifted from casual dating to being a
couple and long-term relationship was I
took a trip to Guatemala by myself over
a summer when he was there he wrote this
stack of letters so he comes back after
his trip to Guatemala and he has his
little notepad and it's just one letter
after another after another and he
probably would have kept going except he
ran out of space it was a lot about how
he was thinking about me and how it
would have been much nicer to be with me
that was when I started to realize that
this is something serious
and I thought this trip wasn't special
or wasn't great because she wasn't there
we got hired at a fair a job fair for
international schools and we went off to
Bangkok it was about two months into it
when I woke up one morning and it was
five o'clock in the morning and I got a
phone call from my mom and I had no idea
what was going on but she's frantic on
the other line she's saying what is
going on are you okay are you okay and
I'm looking at her I'm listening to her
on the phone saying I'm just getting
ready for school I just got out of the
shower like what's going on and she said
haven't you seen on the news everything
was blocked there was no television date
in Thailand when they block off a TV
station they flash pictures of
celebrities and have a message at the
bottom of the screen talking about how
programming will resume momentarily and
so you we had no idea what's going on
apparently while we had been sleeping
there was a coup the army had taken over
the country so she's telling me about
all these tanks that are rolling down
the streets and I kind of peeked out the
window it at our little SOI like our
little Street and there's dogs sitting
out there in the street like there's no
tanks we went in and then decided we'd
go look for tanks because we wanted to
see some sign that there was an actual
coup it's not my memories or his
memories or my time there or his time
there but it was our time that's a huge
thing to have kind of on our own being
in Southeast Asia far from our family
and friends in an entirely different
culture a place that was really hot all
the time I think it was the ultimate
test of a relationship and we handled it
I think very well I just have these
memories for these moments of like us
being there and doing that together not
my memories or his memories or my time
there or his time there but it was our
time that's a huge thing to have kind of
on our own after that first year I
thought if we can do this we can do
anything
and there's nobody better there's nobody
else for me to do this with this is this
is the person for me
